question: Sam had 10 socks. If he threw away 3 old ones that didn't fit and bought 36 new ones, how many socks would he have?
response:
Sam had 10 socks initially. He threw away 3 old ones, so he now has 10 - 3 = <<10-3=7>>7 socks.
He bought 36 new ones, so he now has 7 + 36 = <<7+36=43>>43 socks.
The answer is 43.
